mapper.select: select * from user_market order by u_idx
select count(*) from user_market where u_id=#{u_id} and u_mail=#{u_mail}
mapper.insert: insert into user_market values( (select nvl(max(u_idx)+1,1)from user_market), #{u_id}, #{u_pwd}, #{u_name}, #{u_nickname}, #{u_birth}, #{u_addr}, sysdate, 0, null, 'no_file', #{u_tel}, #{u_mail}, '일반회원', #{u_ip}, #{postcode}, '활동', 0 )
mapper.update: update user set u_name=#{u_name}, u_id=#{u_id}, u_pwd=#{u_pwd}, u_zipcode=#{u_zipcode}, u_addr=#{u_addr) where u_idx=#{ u_idx }
mapper.select: select count(*) from user where to_char(u_regdate,'dd') = to_char(sysdate, 'dd')
